short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of quick and easy-to-use tools or 'Snaps' to simplify your browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛠️ SnapToolbox: Your Browser's Swiss Army Knife 🛠️

🔥 Now with the power of AI ✨

Introducing SnapToolbox, your new favorite browser sidekick. It's like having a toolbox right in your browser, but instead of wrenches and screwdrivers, you've got handy digital tools we call "Snaps."

★ What's a Snap? 🫰🏻

A Snap is a quick, easy-to-use tool that helps you do cool stuff in your browser without breaking a sweat. Need to grab some info from a webpage? There's a Snap for that. Want to make your browsing life easier? We've got you covered.

★ Why SnapToolbox? 🤔

Imagine you're surfing the web, and you suddenly need to do a quick task. Maybe you need to grab some text, extract some data, or do something specific on a website. That's where SnapToolbox comes in! It's right there in your browser, ready to help with just a click.

★ What Can SnapToolbox Do? 💪🏻

Here's what we've got for you right now:

- Nofollow Links Highlighter: This snap automatically highlights all the nofollow, sponsored, and UGC links on web pages with a red dotted outline.

- Reddit Comment Generator: This snap generates AI-powered comments for Reddit posts using the OpenAI or OpenRouter API. It utilizes the post title, content, and a selected number of existing parent comments as context to create human-like comments.

- Reddit Post Scraper: It scrapes the title, content, and comments from Reddit posts. Works on both old and new Reddit interfaces.

- YouTube Transcript Copier: This Snap extracts the transcript of the YouTube video you're watching and copies it to your clipboard. Great for when you need to quote something or want to read through the content later.

- ZimmWriter Outline Extractor: Easily extract outline from any webpage in ZimmWriter supported format in just one-click. A very powerful Snap for Zimmwriter users.

- URL Scraper and Separator: This Snap extract URLs from any webpage using a set prefix, separating them with commas. Useful for creating AI-powered knowledge bases.

- YouTube Keywords Extractor: This Snap digs into the YouTube video's data and pulls out all the keywords it is using for SEO, perfect for keyword research and ideas.

★ How Does It Work? 🏗️

Using SnapToolbox is as easy as pie:

1. Install the extension in your browser.
2. Click on the SnapToolbox icon whenever you need it.
3. Choose the Snap you want to use.
4. Watch the magic happen!

Each Snap is designed to be super quick and easy to use. No complicated settings or confusing interfaces, just click and go!

★ What's Next? 🚀

This is just the beginning of our SnapToolbox journey. We're cooking up more Snaps to add to your toolbox. Got an idea for a Snap you'd love to see? Let us know! We're all ears and excited to make SnapToolbox even more useful for you.

Happy Snapping! ✨
